directions.step: preheat oven to 400 degrees, wash and dry tatoes,. Cut the potato (but only 3/4 through) into 4 slices. Slice onion into 1/4 inch slices then in half, put onion inside potato slices. Rub potato with butter and wrap in tin foil cook for one hour Posted to Bakery-Shoppe Digest V1 #219 by "Pollywog" <hlewis@cci-29palms.com> on Sep 4, 1997
